description.scrape_interval_minutes: How often to scrape data (in minutes)
description.output_filename: Main CSV file to save current data
description.log_filename: Log file for tracking scraper activity
description.max_retries: Number of retry attempts if scraping fails
description.retry_delay_seconds: Seconds to wait between retry attempts
description.enable_logging: Whether to enable logging to file and console
description.log_level: Logging level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL
description.save_historical_data: Whether to save timestamped historical files
description.historical_data_dir: Directory to store historical data files

proxy.type: Proxy type: http, https, socks4, socks5
proxy.host: Proxy server hostname or IP address
proxy.proxy_list: List of proxies for rotation (when rotate_proxies is true)
proxy.rotation_interval: Rotate proxy after this many successful scrapes
